data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (failed_requests IS NULL OR failed_requests = 0) AND (internal_server_errors IS NULL OR internal_server_errors = 0) AND (miscellaneous_server_errors IS NULL OR miscellaneous_server_errors = 0) AND (quota_exceeded_errors IS NULL OR quota_exceeded_errors = 0) AND (server_busy_errors IS NULL OR server_busy_errors = 0) AND (server_errors IS NULL OR server_errors = 0) AND (throttled_requests IS NULL OR throttled_requests = 0)) AS 'Health Score' FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace FACET microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace_name
SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace_name) AS 'Namespaces' FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace FACET resource_group

presentation.title: Resource Group Distribution
presentation.notes: The Resource Group of the Azure resource.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(quota_exceeded_errors) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(throttled_requests) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(archived_messages_throughput) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Archived Messages Throughput (EHAMBS) (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Event Hub archived message throughput in a namespace

data.nrql: SELECT average(outgoing_message_throughput) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Outgoing Message Throughput (EHOUTBYTES) (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Event Hub outgoing message throughput for a namespace

data.nrql: SELECT sum(active_connections) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(event_hub_incoming_requests) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(failed_requests) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Failed Requests (FAILREQ) (Requests)
presentation.notes: Total failed requests for a namespace

data.nrql: SELECT sum(internal_server_errors) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Internal Server Errors (INTERR)
presentation.notes: Total internal server errors for a namespace

data.nrql: SELECT sum(server_errors) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(server_busy_errors) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Server Busy Errors (SVRBSY)
presentation.notes: Total server busy errors for a namespace

data.nrql: SELECT sum(miscellaneous_server_errors) FROM microsoft_azure_eventhub_namespace COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Miscellaneous Server Errors (MISCERR)
presentation.notes: Miscellaneous server errors for a namespace
